name: NotEvenClose
description:
HINTS:
-Dodge into enemies or bullets to earn points
-You can dodge and then jump to dodge in the air

What's this?

Not Even Close Was created under three days  for the ScoreSpaceJam#13

I've took some inspiration from games like DownWell and TowerFall Ascension.
All assets were made by me except for the music which was created by the awesome YouFulca ^^
the controls to play on the phone would go at the bottom of the screen
(Now I need some sleep pls send help)

If you find any errors please comment below ^^
